Checkerboard.NAME: Chess Board
Checkerboard.FLAVOR: You don't know how to play this kind of chess, but you can learn it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw #b16 cards, gain #b2 #yStrength, gain #b2 #yDexterity, put a #yConspiracy into your hand. At the end of this turn lose #b2 #yStrength, lose #b2 #yDexterity.

ChineseChessHorse.NAME: Chinese Chess Horse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b2 #yConspiracies into your hand.

ChessHorse.NAME: Chess Knight
ChessHorse.FLAVOR: You don't know how to play it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b2 #yTrickeries into your hand.

ChineseCheckerboard.NAME: Chinese Chess Board
ChineseCheckerboard.FLAVOR: You are good at playing this kind of chess, but you can't learn more things from it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rChess #rBoard. Whenever you draw #b16 cards, gain #b1 #yStrength, gain #b1 #yDexterity, put a #yTrickery into your hand.

PeakedCap.NAME: PeakedCap
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, reduce a random card's NL cost by 1 this turn. Increase #yHand #ySize by #b4.

SilverDancer.NAME: Silver Dancer
SilverDancer.FLAVOR: This weapon may have come from a super assassin.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, deal #b1 damage to a random enemy.

CamBow.NAME: CamBow
CamBow.FLAVOR: Almost all archers have amazing strength.
DESCRIPTIONS: All the cards with #yArrow effect placed at the top of your draw pile will cost 0 util played.
